original_text: The angels will throw those bad people into the great fire. There the people will cry and they will bite their teeth together.
korean_text: 풀무 불에 던져 넣으리니 거기서 울며 이를 갈게 되리라

sentences.original_text: The angels will throw those bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 천사들은 그 나쁜 사람들을 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will bite their teeth together
